data.text:
One of a kind job. Travelled to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico x2 , Mexico x2, China x2, Japan and all over the U.S. Did building commissioning, contractor training,

Novar is a cutting edge company with a great technical environment. Any employee has the ability to advance if they show initiative. The staff is friendly and their products are top quality with an excellent clientele.

Customer Service & Project Administrator Team Lead in Bentonville, AR

2.0

on November 3, 2015

Management is not equal across the BU. The employees are treated like numbers instead of people. Workloads are not distributed fairly.
